Lavathian Skulls.name: Lavathian Skulls
Lavathian Skulls.desc: Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Smolderin' Plateau monster in the Deathnote. Yea, the 100M Kill Skull. This is gonna take a while.
Lavathian Skulls.rewards: 2% Faster Monster &Respawn Time for &All World 5 mobs

Legendary Flag.name: Legendary Flag
Legendary Flag.desc: On your Siege Breaker, get a Flag Score of 150 or more on Erruption River. This is the number above your Flag!

The True Emperor.name: The True Emperor
The True Emperor.desc: Reach a total of 1 million Wormhole Kills.

Chemical Collector.name: Chemical Collector
Chemical Collector.desc: Harvest a total of 1000 Chemical-type Plants in Gaming.

Lucky Harvest.name: Lucky Harvest
Lucky Harvest.desc: Harvest a plant with a Bit worth who's first 3 digits are 777. For example, 77.7K Bits would count, or 777M Bits too!

Bonsai Bonanza.name: Bonsai Bonanza
Bonsai Bonanza.desc: Harvest a total of 100 Bonsai-type Plants in Gaming.

True Naval Captain.name: True Naval Captain
True Naval Captain.desc: Buy all 20 Boats in Sailing. Uh, yea, there is a scroll bar below the boats, you can buy more than 5 boats #

The Plateauourist.name: The Plateauourist
The Plateauourist.desc: Reach World 5, a personal favorite world of mine! Look, I like lava what can I say.

Broken Controller.name: Broken Controller
Broken Controller.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ You got... zero? Literally zero?? Jeez, Im sorry but I think you need to uninstall ^

Vitamin D-licious.name: Vitamin D-licious
Vitamin D-licious.desc: Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Orange Slices in your Storage Chest.

Grand Captain.name: Grand Captain
Grand Captain.desc: Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 10. They shall sail the seas with confidence!

Utter DISRESPECT.name: Utter DISRESPECT
Utter DISRESPECT.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Why did you even hire the poor fella in the first place???

POiNG Champion.name: POiNG Champion
POiNG Champion.desc: Get a POiNG score of 25,000 or more! My personal highscore is 38
POiNG Champion.rewards: 323 at the time of coding this!

Legendary Orb.name: Legendary Orb
Legendary Orb.desc: On your Divine Knight, get an Orb Score of 400 or more on OJ Bay. This is the number above your Orb!

Perfect Trade Deal.name: Perfect Trade Deal
Perfect Trade Deal.desc: Make a trade with Blobby G worth a gold bar amount that starts with 777, like 777K or 7.77M for example. PS 776 and 778 work too lol

No Krakens? ):.name: No Krakens? ):
No Krakens? ):.desc: Reach Wave 50 of Citric Conflict tower defence without placing a single Kraken Towers. Not even one.

Voraci Vantasia.name: Voraci Vantasia
Voraci Vantasia.desc: Harvest a total of 500 Voraci-type Plants in Gaming.

Artifact Finder.name: Artifact Finder
Artifact Finder.rewards: *1 Extra Chest Slot in &Sailing Loot Pile

Seaworthy Captain.name: Seaworthy Captain
Seaworthy Captain.desc: Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 15. Few captains in the universe can rival their ability to plunder!

Wurm Wumbo.name: Wurm Wumbo
Wurm Wumbo.desc: Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Mongo Worm Slices in your Storage Chest.

The True King.name: The True King
The True King.desc: Reach a total of 1 million Orb Kills.

Sneaky Stealing.name: Sneaky Stealing
Sneaky Stealing.desc: SECRET ACHIEVEMENT ------------------------ Walk to a uh... weird location? Well it's not that weird, but it's just like, what ya doin' back there?

Maple Logger.name: Maple Logger
Maple Logger.desc: Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Maple Logs in your Storage Chest.

Maroon Warship.name: Maroon Warship
Maroon Warship.desc: Upgrade a boat to Lv 300 in Sailing. This is the pinnacle of naval prowess, it doesn't get fancier than this!
Maroon Warship.rewards: 1 Lv to all Talents &for all characters

Supernatural Gamer.name: Supernatural Gamer
Supernatural Gamer.desc: Reach level 300 on any character! My oh my! This would have been inconceivable just a few years ago!

Too Cute To Live.name: Too Cute To Live
Too Cute To Live.desc: You're gonna kill all them lil' poofs? You monster... well, at least make it quick, like 20s or less after entering the map.

The True Pirate.name: The True Pirate
The True Pirate.desc: Reach a total of 1 million Plunderous Kills. This one is the true challenge of the three.

Smokin' Stars.name: Smokin' Stars
Smokin' Stars.desc: Complete all constellations in the Smolderin' Plateau. You can check you progress within the Telescope.

Legendary Wormhole.name: Legendary Wormhole
Legendary Wormhole.desc: On your Elemental Sorcerer, get a Wormhole Score of 83 or more on Niagrilled Falls. This is the number above your Wormhole!

Artifact Jones.name: Artifact Jones
Artifact Jones.desc: Collect all 30 ANCIENT Artifacts from Sailing. All that glitters is not gold, but it sure is shiny!

Gilded Vessel.name: Gilded Vessel
Gilded Vessel.desc: Upgrade a boat to Lv 100 in Sailing. It'll turn gold to reflect its power!
Gilded Vessel.rewards: *1 Extra Chest Slot in &Sailing Loot Pile

Long Live Bagur.name: Long Live Bagur
Long Live Bagur.desc: Unlock the 10th and final Divinity God.
